Articles.Content:
Hi folks,

New start for the Grand Tour series, linky :

http://youtu.be/rVK41usPBVs

now using the following mods...

CKAN

6S Service Compartment Tubes

Active Texture Management

Better Bouyancy

Biza Command Pod

Chatterer

Coherent Contracts

Community Resource Pack

Docking Port Alignment Indicator

Editor Extensions

EVA Parachutes by default

Extraplanetary Launchpads (Regolith)

Final Frontier

Firespitter

In-Flight Waypoints

KAE

Karbonite

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Kerbal Attachment System

Kerbal Construction Time

Kerbal Flight Indicators

Kerbal Foundries

Kerbal Stats

MSI IR fork

Mechjeb 2

Modular Fuel Tanks

Module Manager

Module RCSFX

Movie Time

Near Future

Pilot Assistant

Professor Phineas Kerbensteins wonderous vertical propulsion emporium v0.20a

Real Chute

Regolith

SCANSat

Science Alert

Sounding Rockets

Spherical and Toroidal Tank Pack

Stage Recovery

Steam Punk Pack v0.38

Texture Replacer

Toolbar

Trajectories

Umbra Space Industries Tools

USI Asteroid Recycling Technologies

USI Exploration Pack

USI Freight Transport Technologies

USI Kolonisation System (MKS/OKS)

USI Survival Pack

Vanguard Technologies Core

Mods to be added when compatibility issues fixed :

Hangar

Edited January 4, 2015 by Kranth
missed a mod.
